You also take part in preparation for an interview with the Customer (provide information about possible questions, suggest trainings to attend).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employees from your pool can be booked by PM/DM/AM of the Project or Opportunity once you propose them, but you should check whether the booking is still valid. Both internal and external candidates in \\\"Booked\\\" status will be switched to \\\"Proposed\\\" status after 7 biz days of staying in \\\"Booked\\\" status (exception – applicants from India, A1/O track employees).
